Articles.Content:
4 hours ago, jimmymcgoochie said:

I’ll give that a try when I can, thanks @linuxgurugamer

Keep in mind that what I did was to remove the ModuleDeployableSolarPanel , so it probably won't work as part of the SimpleLogistics network any more

I don't know why it didn't give an error in 1.9, but I tried a number of things to make it work, and it just doesn't.  Something to do with the model of the part in the .mu file

Edited November 5, 2020 by linuxgurugamer
I’ve never actually tried using the deployable science parts as part of a SL network so I won’t notice the difference.

Hello,

Since the mod wasn't loading on KSP 1.11 and made it hangs I went to the file

DeployableScience.cfg

and changed this line, it appears three times:

:NEEDS[SquadExpansion/Serenity,SimpleLogistics]:AFTER[SimpleLogistics]

Into this one:

:AFTER[SquadExpansion,SimpleLogistics]

Not sure how it will behave if you dont have any squad expansion, but it made the mod load... I supose.

Edited January 17, 2021 by Elkram

So do i! Once I installed this on my 1.11.2....it stuck on this file forever on loading the game. DeployableScience.cfg You are not the only one...

Are you usre by removing the ModuleDeployableSolarPanel, will it be fixed?
Great mod!  Many thanks to all who;ve worked so hard on it! Any idea when CKAN will be able to access the version with the DeployableSolaranel fix?
construction zone. updating.

Hopefully updating it to 1.12 is relatively painless, it's such a nice mod for doing trips between kerbinside airports etc, just having an a mining rig/USI fuel hopper sitting at ones you go to often simplifies refueling so much since you don't need to tempt the kraken with 1g docking.

20 hours ago, Crimor said:

Hopefully updating it to 1.12 is relatively painless, it's such a nice mod for doing trips between kerbinside airports etc, just having an a mining rig/USI fuel hopper sitting at ones you go to often simplifies refueling so much since you don't need to tempt the kraken with 1g docking.

just waiting a week or two to see if any issues/user reports are filed first. no reason it shouldn't work already. I've very  briefly loaded 1.11 with it - ymmv.

I'll probably give it a spin tomorrow to see if my computer explodes.

 

Edit:

A short test seems to be fine, I'll update if I find any future errors

Edited August 14, 2021 by Crimor

I've encountered some funky things once or twice since installing this, but nothing game breaking. For example, resource conversion happening at ludicrous speed. Pretty certain this is the culprit, but it's not much of a problem atm.
Is on the short list.
Dead mod?

5 hours ago, Starslinger999 said:

Dead mod?

absolutely not @Starslinger999

Edited August 8, 2022 by zer0Kerbal
Does this mod stil work in 1.12.3? Also does it conflict with Ship Manifest?

6 hours ago, Zefnoly said:

Does this mod stil work in 1.12.3? Also does it conflict with Ship Manifest?

@Zefnoly It should and it shouldn't.

 

it is also slated for an update compile

Edited September 6, 2022 by zer0Kerbal

On 9/6/2022 at 2:45 AM, zer0Kerbal said:

@Zefnoly It should and it shouldn't.

 

it is also slated for an update compile

Thanks for response! Gonna see if I will give it a try. Keep up these QOL mods! They have been great help for my current modpack.
The AVC version checker plugin is telling me that I should update this mod to version 2.0.6.0, which doesn't exist

On 9/10/2022 at 10:27 AM, infinite_monkey said:

The AVC version checker plugin is telling me that I should update this mod to version 2.0.6.0, which doesn't exist 

@infinite_monkey oops - that file slipped in. There is a 2.0.6.0 - just not released yet.

On 9/7/2022 at 7:31 AM, Zefnoly said:

Thanks for response! Gonna see if I will give it a try. Keep up these QOL mods! They have been great help for my current modpack.

@Zefnoly YVMW

Edited September 13, 2022 by zer0Kerbal
update links and lasso the birds

Heya! version I am using seems to not want to display the logistics GUI. it says "distance to closest vessel is 0m(250 max)" and "Altitude is 0m (max 50)" and "#SimpleLogistics_msgGroundSpeed"

 

I am using Artix Linux. 

ksp.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YBvYfwdBEyA33MDAZeNP8aJ7puXRFKjj/view?usp=sharing

On 9/13/2022 at 3:43 PM, zer0Kerbal said:

oops - that file slipped in. There is a 2.0.6.0 - just not released yet.

Is 2.0.6.0 ready? I still get 2.0.5.0 via the OP github link and CKAN.

6 hours ago, DeadJohn said:

Is 2.0.6.0 ready? I still get 2.0.5.0 via the OP github link and CKAN.

I am working on it as I type. Okay, not as I type since I only have two hands... ;P

All ready for the release - just having issues getting the compiler set up on my new machine. I will work on it later today. 

 

12 hours ago, eagleswing12 said:

Heya! version I am using seems to not want to display the logistics GUI. it says "distance to closest vessel is 0m(250 max)" and "Altitude is 0m (max 50)" and "#SimpleLogistics_msgGroundSpeed"

 

I am using Artix Linux. 

ksp.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YBvYfwdBEyA33MDAZeNP8aJ7puXRFKjj/view?usp=sharing

SimpleLogistics v2.0.4.0 / v2.0.3.9

SO many ERRORS/Warnings. - none that I can find relating to SLOG. Discuss Here: https://github.com/zer0Kerbal/SimpleLogistics/discussions/36

_SLOG-LOG-2022-12-28 2-06-37.zip
^^^ is an abbreviated log (text) with only SLOG/ERR/WRN.

18 hours ago, eagleswing12 said:

Heya! version I am using seems to not want to display the logistics GUI. it says "distance to closest vessel is 0m(250 max)" and "Altitude is 0m (max 50)" and "#SimpleLogistics_msgGroundSpeed"

 

I am using Artix Linux. 

ksp.log: https://drive.google.com/file/d/1YBvYfwdBEyA33MDAZeNP8aJ7puXRFKjj/view?usp=sharing

I was getting the same error message under KSP 1.12.3 and Windows 11. I then tried different settings and with altitude, distance, and speed sliders set to 0m the mod began to work better for me.

On 12/28/2022 at 7:54 AM, DeadJohn said:

I was getting the same error message under KSP 1.12.3 and Windows 11. I then tried different settings and with altitude, distance, and speed sliders set to 0m the mod began to work better for me.

@DeadJohn I was just coming to suggest just that. Normal operation is only permitted 'landed' - not pre-launch, flying, orbiting, splashed, or other.

Adjusting the Game Settings like you did should help.

Also - working on pushing out 2.0.6.0-relese out - this will be basically just a recompile/maintenance release. Then will try to get 2.0.99.0-prerelease out in the next week or fortnight. There is allot of technical-debt and documentation-debt, and backstage-debt to payoff.

At the same time I shall put out a short video; like the ones I have been putting out for all my latest releases. Find it in the release notes, my twitch or youtube channels, or in my @zer0Kerbal twitter feed.

On 9/10/2022 at 10:27 AM, infinite_monkey said:

The AVC version checker plugin is telling me that I should update this mod to version 2.0.6.0, which doesn't exist 

@infinite_monkey this will be fixed.

On 1/18/2022 at 5:57 PM, Axelord FTW said:

I've encountered some funky things once or twice since installing this, but nothing game breaking. For example, resource conversion happening at ludicrous speed. Pretty certain this is the culprit, but it's not much of a problem atm.

@Axelord FTW did it go to Plaid? Might suggest you suggest a feature (limit xfer rate)  here.

On 8/13/2021 at 5:36 PM, Crimor said:

I'll probably give it a spin tomorrow to see if my computer explodes.

@Crimor did your computer explode?

wow, there is so much backstage work...

Edited December 30, 2022 by zer0Kerbal
added strong red coloring

Version 2.0.6.0-release - <Supply & Demand>

  • Released
    • 28 Dec 2022
    • for Kerbal Space Program 1.12.4
    • by zer0Kerbal

For best results - DO A CLEAN INSTALL; DELETE EXISTING INSTALLATION THEN RE-INSTALL

Download from CurseForge

Summary

Spoiler
  • Release for KSP 1.12.4
  • <SimpleLogistics.dll> 2.0.4.0 --> 2.0.6.109
  • Proper credit given (apologies)

Code

  • <SimpleLogistics.dll> 2.0.4.0 --> 2.0.6.109
  • Compiled for
    • KSP 1.12.4
    • .NET 4.6.2
    • C# 8.0

Bugs

  • moved textures into the sun
  • <Changelog.cfg>
    • Convert to markdown
  • <ja.cfg>
    • missing Localization key
  • <DeployableBatteries.cfg>
    • Fix :NEEDS, move some into :HAS
  • closes #37 - [BUG] config file issues

Backstage

  • massive update (everything)

Localization 2.0.6.0

  • Update
    • Localization/
      • add headers
      • <en-us.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <en-us.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <pt-br.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <de-de.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <es-es.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <fr-fr.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <it-it.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <ja.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <ru.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <zh-cn.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <ko.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <no-no.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • <sw.cfg> v1.0.1.0
      • [readme.md] v2.1.2.0
      • [quickstart.md] v1.0.1.1
    • closes #38 - Update Localization files

    • closes #41 - Brazalian (Português Brasil) <pt-br.cfg>
    • closes #42 - German (Deutsch) <de-de.cfg>

Status

  • Issues
    • closes #31 - SimpleLogistics! (SLOG!) 2.0.6.0-prerelease <Supply & Demand>
    • closes #32 - 2.0.6.0 Verify Legal Mumbo Jumbo
    • closes #33 - 2.0.6.0 Update Documentation
    • closes #34 - 2.0.6.0 Social Media
  • PR's
    • #14 - add game settings/difficulty setting (options):

    • #17 - Localization - contributed by zer0Kerbal
    • #18 - ability to set in part.cfg
    • #19 - Lgg dev branch - contributed by linuxgurugamer

    • #22 - correction in comments - contributed by zer0Kerbal
    • #24 - Version 2.0.5.0 - Routine Maintenance - contributed by zer0Kerbal
